Samir Hosny

Samir is a person who has a passion for learning new technologies all the time, I got my Bachelor degree in Computer Science and then started working in the field of cloud computing since 5 years. I think that Threefold step in a place where no one go there before, touching the limits of technology and how it can help with the daily life actions of people.
